description:
Feel like Alex Honnold and support a good cause in this ergonomically designed harness that sets you up with comfort and performance. The Solution Harness' generous EVA foam provides cushy comfort while hangdogging or belaying, while the mesh lining keeps overheating and moisture at bay. A flexible design means it won’t get in the way while high-stepping or heel-hooking. 4 stiff gear loops keep draws and your rack in position for fast, fumble-free access.

  • Triple-weave webbing moves with your body during technical, demanding moves
  • EVA foam with padded mesh lining is cushy, breathable and without pressure points
  • Self-locking speed buckle and non-adjustable leg loops make for fast changes
  • 4 stiff gear loops
  • Limited-edition colour with Alex Honnold's signature on left leg loop
  • A portion of sales goes to the Honnold Foundation, supporting solar energy for a more equitable world
name: Black Diamond Solution Harness Honnold Edition - Men's
